trans-unit.source: This website is intended for Canadian consumers of products and services of Unilever Canada Inc. This website is not intended for consumers outside Canada.
Sign up today and start exploring the world with hundreds of international and local recipes, your own unique meal plans, and convenient grocery delivery.
Find mealtime inspiration and start planning your week today
Select delicious recipes. Create instant grocery lists. Delivered straight to your door.
Make every meal an adventure with 500+ chef curated dishes.
Add recipes from around the world to your personalized 'Meal Plan'. Make cooking an adventure with deliciously diverse meals.
Your chosen ingredients, delivered to your door, from your go-to grocery store.
Enjoy delicious recipe inspiration, personalized meal plans and delivery for a great cooking experience.

trans-unit.source: With Meals That Matter, cooking is an easier, more manageable part of your busy routine. See how a little food prep and planning gives you a head start in the kitchen today.
Select the filters below to narrow down your search.

With Meals That Matter, cooking is an easier, more manageable part of your busy routine.
See how a little food prep and planning gives you a head start in the kitchen today.
Click add to add a recipe to your 'Meal Plan'. Click favorite_border to save it to your favourites for later.
Click add to add a recipe to your 'Meal Plan'. Click favorite_border to save it to your favourites for later.
When you find something you like, use the heart to save your favourites and you can find it again here.
It looks like you havenât added any recipes to your favourites yet
Click NEXT when you're ready, to shop ingredients for these recipes. Click remove to remove recipes.
Order ingredients for delivery right here, or share them to shop in store
You're one step away from exploring 500+ recipes from around the world.
Can I purchase my meal plan online?
*Due to COVID-19 there is higher than normal volume on grocery delivery right now, therefore delivery times may be impacted through Metro & Save on Foods.
How do I build my meal plan?

Easy! From the home page, click 'get started', and make sure you have registered. Youâll then be directed to the âSelect Recipesâ page. This is where youâll start browsing through our collection of delicious recipes.
To add a meal to your meal plan, simply click the green â+â button on the top right of the recipe. To see your Meal Plan, click on green next button on the select recipes page.
PS: You can always find these pages on the progress bar or the side menu if youâre on your phone.
How do I add a recipe to my favourite list of recipes?

First, click on the little heart icon on the bottom left corner of the recipe image. Second, to see the recipes youâve previously added to your favourites, click âFavouritesâ in the side menu on your phone or the navigation bar on desktop.
How do I see the recipe instructions?

Click on the recipe name or image and the full recipe page will open as a popup. Then youâll find the cooking instructions in the tabs below the recipe image to the right of the âIngredientsâ tab.
Can I see detailed nutritional information?

Yep! When you click on the recipe name or image, the full recipe page will open as a popup. Then youâll find nutrition facts in the tabs below the recipe image to the right of the âInstructionsâ tab.
Is there an easier way for me to access this website to plan my meals?

Yes! You can add the Meals That Matter website to your phoneâs home screen just like an app. For iOS, launch the Safari browser and go to Mealsthatmatter.com. Tap the Share button, then scroll until you find the âAdd to Home Screenâ buttonâ¦and tap to download. For Android, launch Chrome and go to Mealsthatmatter.com. Tap the menu button, then tap âAdd to Homescreenâ. >Once downloaded, The Meals That Matter icon will appear on your home screen for you to drag and place wherever you like.

Weâre pleased to offer our service free of charge! At Meals That Matter, we have a mission to help Canadians reclaim weeknight cooking, and we hope that our website helps you do just that. Of course, youâll still have to pay for your groceries! Those prices and delivery charges (if applicable) are determined by the retailer you choose to shop with.
Are there Italian/Asian/30 minutes or less recipes?

Yesâ¦ and more ð The best way to explore these recipes is to use the filter feature on the âSelect Recipesâ page. We have over 500 recipes that span across multiple recipe categories.
We are always improving and adding to our recipe collection so stay tuned for more dietary options.
Is membership required in order to create a meal plan/shop?

Yes. In order to create and shop a meal plan you will need to have an account with us. To create a new account simply click the âget startedâ button on our homepage and then fill out your details to register.
Once registered, you will have access to 500+ recipes with new recipes being added all the time as well as exclusive offers and the ability to simply shop your meal plan online or instore.
Can I view by category like breakfast, brunch, dinner?
Yes! You can find those categories easily by filtering on the âSelect Recipes' page.
My grocery list includes every ingredient in the recipes, including staples I already have like flour, spices, and seasonings. Is there a way to edit my grocery list to remove staples?

If you choose to shop your grocery list online, your items will be sent to the grocery cart on the retailer website. From there, you can remove items you already have before you checkout.
If you choose to shop in-store, you can check off items to indicate that you already have them. Unfortunately you are not able to remove these items completely at this time. However, weâre also looking to improve our service!
Find tips & tricks to improve your cooking skills and help you reclaim weeknight cooking
Questions? Comments? We value your feedback and would love to hear from you.
You can contact us in a variety of ways, the choice is yours.

If you would like to speak to a live representative, please call us at 1-800-899-1120, Monday to Friday between 8:30 AM-6:00 PM Eastern Time.
If this is a medical or product safety emergency, please call
1-800-297-7421.
This number is available 24 hours a day / 7 days a week.
